CustomField.description: Column that determines the key-field values for the lightning-datatable. Only use this field if you want the column visible, otherwise just specify the api field name in the appropriate field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Column that determines the key-field values for the lightning-datatable. Only use this field if you want the column visible, otherwise just specify the api field name in the appropriate field.
CustomField.label: Id column settings
